feat(storybook): Standardize story paths and add chevron view to TaskBreakdown

Major Storybook reorganization for better navigation and consistency:

**Story Path Standardization:**
- Remove ''Components/'' prefix from all story titles (17 files updated)
- Unified structure: Mobile/, Dashboard/, Shared/, System/, Tasks/, Workflows/
- Eliminates duplicate sidebar folders
- Cleaner, more professional Storybook navigation

**Story Organization (Option C - Nested Paths):**
- Mobile/Modals/TaskBreakdown with nested structure:
  - Default (quick start)
  - ChevronView/ (Basic, Interactive, Complex, ManySteps)
  - CardView/ (Basic, Simple)
  - Features/ (LiveDecomposition, Clarifications, ProcessingSpeed)
  - EdgeCases/ (AllAtomic)
  - States/ (Opening, Closing)
- Reduced from 14 to 13 stories (combined ProcessingSpeed)

**TaskBreakdownModal Enhancements:**
- **Chevron View as default** (replaces Tree View)
- Uses AsyncJobTimeline with SVG chevrons for visual task breakdown
- Card View moved to secondary tab
- Improved story descriptions with ADHD optimization notes

**Files Updated:**
- 17 story files with path standardization
- TaskBreakdownModal: Chevron view implementation
- All Mobile, Shared, Dashboard story paths

Result: Professional, scalable Storybook organization with clear hierarchy.
